text: Otoko no shinja mo on'na no shinja mo, tagaini nakamadearu. Kare-ra wa tadashi koto o susume, jaaku o kinjiru. Mata reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, arra to sono shito ni shitagau. Korera no mono ni, arra wa jihi o ataeru. Hontoni arra wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru
